data.title: York Theatre Royal
data.meta_description: York Theatre Royal has been welcoming and entertaining audiences since 1744. Big productions to fringe theatre, dance, musicals and our family pantomime.
data.text:
Come inside, see it live, be part of it. This autumn and winter we’ve got a programme of work that will excite, enchant and entertain. We are thrilled to be creating a new production of Louisa May Alcott classic, Little Women, brilliantly adapted for the stage, from the novel we all know and love, by Anne-Marie Casey. For dance lovers, we’ve got world-class performances from London City Ballet, Company Wayne McGregor, and the Jasmin Vardimon Company. And, of course, it’s not Christmas without panto. Come and join us for Aladdin.

To make the most of your visits to York Theatre Royal, become a Member today. YTR Membership is the best way to stay up to date with all the upcoming shows. With priority booking and 10% off tickets and in our cafe and bar, if you love theatre get exclusive access to the best seats at the best prices and enjoy your visit to your local theatre.

Membership is just £6 a month (£72 a year) and is a fantastic way to not only access huge savings, but also help to support the theatre. We have an amazing Creative Engagement team that work with vulnerable children in our Access All Areas Programme, help adults improve their mental health with Theatre for Wellbeing and engage with local schools and communities. Your membership helps us make the difference, so why not sign up today to make the most of your theatre.
